headline: GTA Online
subtitle: GTA Online Bonuses: Half Off Executive Offices, Warehouses & More (Sep 30 - Oct 3)
content:
Get all the tools you'll need to take control of your Los Santos business empire this weekend with a collection of colossal discounts and bonuses in GTA Online. Between now and Monday, October 3rd, take half off Warehouses, Executive Offices and all Lester, Pegasus and Merryweather Services.

Check out rockstargames.com/newswire for all the details.
